name: Deeper (Aberration_Games)
description:
Find a prized diamond at the bottom of a dig site that has lately been shrouded in mystery. Many treasure hunters have travelled here in search of riches, but none have yet returned to tell the tale... 

The creatures that lie in the depths of the earth  feast in darkness -- buy items and upgrades to avoid them and keep your light flickering while you search for fortune.

Credits:

Damian Jankowski

Kobe Shi

Patrick McKeever

Tyler Schneider

Faraaz Iqbal

With music by:  Dylan Abramowitz
